titles.title: Support Our Startups Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for start-up expenditures for business for 2013 and 2014.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/24/2013--Introduced. Support Our Startups Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an increased tax deduction for business start-up expenditures in 2013 and 2014
